properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 9:30PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warnings continue for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...Oliver Lock and Dam... and Selden Lock and Dam...

.Flood Warnings continue along the Black Warrior River due to expected
rainfall amounts between 4 and 6 inches upstream through the day on
Tuesday. Additional heavy rainfall is possible through the end of
this upcoming week which will cause water levels to remain elevated
or increase further. Interests should closely monitor the latest
river forecasts through the upcoming week.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 9 PM Sunday the stage was 99.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 102.8 feet by
Friday evening. Additional rises may be possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 102 feet...Residential flooding begins in the area.
Numerous cabins and trailers in Hale and Greene counties become
flooded.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Monday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
